name: Rhys Parker
story: Tally joined the BLUFOR forces after finishing his studies in mechanical engineering. His analytical skills and attention to detail make him a valuable asset to his team. Tally has two wifes, Khadija and Shahida. With Khadija he has 3 children, and with Shahida he has 2. He is highly motivated to complete his missions and return home safely to his family.
